Name: La Joyita De Villa Nueva Group
description:
Mirma Medaris continues with her plant nursery business. She offers different types of plants, and is very happy because her business is prospering.

She is requesting a loan to be able to invest in varieties of plants, and mulch, pots, and hangers.

Thanks to the loans obtained, she has made her business grow and has expanded to a large shop where she better displays the variety of plants, and provides better service because now she has parking for customers.

Her husband and daughter make the home deliveries, because they have daily orders on the web site from different parts of the capital city. They also deliver to departments.

They all work together to get ahead and to have the necessary income.
